segments.text: After the financial crisis , many industries are in incredibly cloudy situations . How do you think about our company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The outlook in the future is very positive . Because we have been in this field for hundreds of years and we know how to survive this crisis safely .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As the department I am applying for is expanding , I would like to contribute by effort .
segments.speaker: S1
